message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $20,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $20,000 on it at this time. Would you consider lowering the price to something closer to my budget, perhaps around $12,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While $12,000 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $17,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to agree to $17,000. Could you possibly reconsider and come down to a price closer to my maximum limit of $12,000?
